titles: The declaration of William and Mary, King and Queen of England, France and Ireland, to all their loving subjects in the kingdom of Ireland.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
William, III, King of England, 1650-1702.
Mary II, Queen of England, 1662-1694.
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb, Printer to the King and Queen's most excellent Majesties ;
notes: Dated: Given at Our Court at Whitehall this 22th. day of February, 1688. In the first year of Our Reign.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Ireland --  History --  War of 1689-1691 --  Early works to 1800.
